title: Caresure Women Care Insurance Policy
content1: Unique Cover: A specially designed policy that provides multi-fold benefits for women
content2: Automatic Restoration: 100% of the Sum Insured is restored once in a policy period
content3: Delivery Expenses: Normal & C-section delivery expenses are covered (including pre and post-natal)

title: Caresure Comprehensive Insurance Policy
content1: Automatic Restoration: Get 100% of the basic Sum Insured restored once in a policy year
content2: Buy-back PED: Optional cover to reduce the waiting period in respect of Pre-Existing Diseases
content3: Mid-term inclusion: Newly married/wedded spouse and new born baby are covered on payment of additional premium

title: Senior Citizens Red Carpet Health Insurance Policy
content1: Elderly Cover: Designed for the age group of 60-75 years with lifelong renewals
content2: Outpatient Cover: Get cover for medical consultations as an outpatient at Network Hospitals
content3: Pre-insurance Screening: Pre-insurance screening is not required to avail this policy

title: Family Health Optima Insurance Plan
content1: Automatic Restoration: 100% of the Sum insured is restored thrice in a policy year
content2: Additional Sum Insured for Road Traffic Accident: The Sum insured is increased for Road Traffic Accident on exhaustion of the limit of coverage
content3: Recharge Benefit: Get additional indemnity once in a policy year on exhaustion of the limit of coverage

title: Caresure Health Premier Insurance Policy
content1: Special Policy: Designed for people aged 50 years and above without any maximum age limit
content2: Pre-insurance Screening: Pre-Insurance screening is not required to avail this policy
content3: Health Check-Up Discount: 10% premium discount is available if listed health check-up reports are submitted at the inception of the policy and subject to the findings in the submitted report

title: Super Surplus Insurance Policy
content1: Top-up Plan: Get enhanced health coverage at an affordable premium
content2: Recharge Benefit: Get additional indemnity on exhaustion of the Sum Insured at no additional cost
content3: Long-Term Discount: If the policy is opted for a term of 2 years, then 5% premium discount is available

title: Medi Classic Insurance Policy (Individual)
content1: Restoration Benefit: 200% of the basic Sum Insured is restored once in a policy period
content2: Road Traffic Accident: The Sum insured is increased for Road Traffic Accident on its exhaustion
content3: Long-Term Discount: if the policy is opted for a term of 2 or 3 years, then a discount on the premium is available

title: Caresure Health Gain Insurance Policy
content1: Wide Cover: Provides broad cover for both in-patient hospitalisation and outpatient expenses
content2: Modern Treatment: Expenses are covered either as in-patient hospitalisation or day care procedures
content3: Outpatient benefit: Outpatient expenses incurred at any Networked Facility are covered

title: Caresure Micro Rural and Farmers Care
content1: Rural Cover: Exclusively designed for rural population
content2: Pre-insurance Screening: Pre-insurance screening is not required to avail this policy
content3: Less Waiting Period: PED & Specific Diseases are covered just after 6 months

title: Caresure Hospital Cash Insurance Policy
content1: Lump-sum Benefit for Hospitalisation: Designed to provide daily cash benefit for incidental expenses on hospitalisation
content2: ICU Hospital Cash: Get up to 200% of the hospital cash amount (per day) in case of ICU hospitalisation
content3: Accident Hospital Cash: Get up to 150% of the hospital cash amount every 24 hours of hospitalisation in case of accidents

title: Caresure Out Patient Care Insurance Policy
content1: Outpatient Cover: Outpatient consultation expenses are covered at Network Hospitals
content2: Diagnostic & Pharmacy: Expenses are covered at Network Hospitals
content3: Dental & Ophthalmic: Expenses are covered at Network Hospitals

title: Young Caresure Insurance Policy
content1: Automatic Restoration: 100% of the Sum insured is restored once in a policy period
content2: Mid-term Inclusion: Entitles you to add newly married or wedded spouse, legally adopted child and new born baby in the middle of the policy year
content3: Loyalty Discount: 10% discount for opting the policy before 36 years and continuously renewing it beyond 40 years of age

title: Arogya Sanjeevani Policy, Caresure Health and Allied Insurance Co Ltd.
content1: Rural Discount: 20% discount on premium for the rural population
content2: Modern Treatments: Get cover for Modern treatments up to 50% of the Sum insured
content3: AYUSH Cover: Covers hospitalisation expenses towards AYUSH treatments

title: Caresure Health Assure Insurance Policy
content1: Family Size: Covers 6 Adults and 3 Children including, seif, spouse, parents and parents-in-law
content2: Automatic Restoration: Sum Insured will be restored unlimited number of times and maximum up to 100% each time
content3: Long-Term Discount: if the policy is opted for a term of 2 or 3 years, then a discount on the premium is available

title: Diabetes Safe Insurance Policy
content1: Diabetic Cover: Designed to cover people diagnosed with both type-1 and type 2 diabetes
content2: Family Cover: Can also avail this policy on a floater basis (self & spouse) if either of them is diabetic
content3: Automatic Restoration: Get 100% of the Sum insured restored once in a policy year for Individual plan

title: Caresure Cardiac Care Insurance Policy
content1: Cardiac Cover: Covers person diagnosed with Cardiac ailments aged between 10 and 65 years
content2: Non-Cardiac Cover: Also covers Non-Cardiac ailments and accidents
content3: Pre-insurance Screening: Pre-insurance screening is not required to avail this policy

title: Caresure Cardiac Care Insurance Policy-Platinum
content1: Exclusive Cover: Specially designed policy for people diagnosed with Cardiac ailment or disorder
content2: Pre-insurance Screening: Pre-insurance screening is not required to avail this policy
content3: Cardiac Devices: Get up to 50% of the Sum Insured for Cardiac devices

title: Caresure Cancer Care Platinum Insurance Policy
content1: Exclusive Cover: Specially designed policy for people diagnosed with Cancer
content2: Wide Cover: In addition to Cancer, it also covers regular hospitalisation expenses unrelated to Cancer
content3: Lump Sum Cover: As an optional cover, a lump sum is provided for recurrence of Cancer, metastasis and/or second malignancy unrelated to first Cancer

title: Caresure Critical Illness Multipay Insurance Policy
content1: Unique Cover: The policy covers 37 major critical illnesses
content2: Caresure Wellness Program: Avail premium discounts for maintaining a healthy lifestyle
content3: Pre-insurance Screening: Pre-insurance screening is not required until 50 years of age to avail this policy

title: Caresure Extra Protect - Add on Cover
content1: Add on Cover: Get the limits of your base policy enhanced with an affordable premium
content2: Modern Treatment: Expenses are covered up to the Sum insured of the Base policy if there is an admissible claim under the base policy
content3: Claim Guard: Get cover for non-medical items if there is an admissible claim under your base policy

title: Caresure Special Care
content1: Special Cover: A unique policy designed for people diagnosed with Autism Spectrum Disorder
content2: Medical Screening: Pre-insurance screening is not required to avail this policy
content3: Modern Treatment: Expenses for Modern Treatments are covered up to specified limits
